output:
Out on a ledge, the view is beautiful The sky is wonderful, so deep, so blue
Somebody said, this isn't new to us Feeling adventurous and new
Once the first wave has begun to break We won't hesitate to follow through
Out on the road, followed by emptiness Teased by mindless bliss, an empty kiss
Somebody said, I wish I could melt you down I wish I could bring you round
My way, out on a limb We begin to shake
Watch the hours take our will to win
Somebody said, the sun has just begun To shine for one who is loved
